title: [REGRESSION, iOS, 3.119.0] SKGLView malfunctions sometimes on iOS on newer iPads
body:
### Description

In our game GnollHack, SKGLView malfunctions with drawing one large bitmap in 3.119.0 on iOS when using Apple iPad 13,17. Other iOS devices (iPhones and older iPad) we tested seemed to work fine, although this might have been just a lucky coincidence. Everything works in 3.116.1 on all iOS devices, and on all other platforms using both SKGLView and SKCanvasView.

3.119.0:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/34b6bbf0-1ab1-4b0c-a624-151cbd32f07f)

3.116.1:

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5200f03e-2052-4eee-87b1-ddea2d76dd04)

We subsequently downgraded SkiaSharp to 3.116.1.


### Code

See the reproduction repository at https://github.com/hyvanmielenpelit/GnollHackMAUIEasyBuild

### Expected Behavior

On iPad 13,17, SkiaSharp 3.119.0 and 3.116.1 draw the screen in the same way.

### Actual Behavior

On iPad 13,17, SkiaSharp 3.119.0 draws the screen only partially in a bugged way, while 3.116.1 draws it correctly.

### Version of SkiaSharp

3.119.0 (Current)

### Last Known Good Version of SkiaSharp

3.116.1

### IDE / Editor

Visual Studio (Windows)

### Platform / Operating System

iOS

### Platform / Operating System Version

iOS 18.4.1

### Devices

Apple iPad 13,17
